3191303848.name: G-12 High Explosive
3191303848.description: A high explosive grenade which damages lightly armored targets. Creates high damage over a small area when detonated.

375014954.name: G-23 Stun
375014954.description: Temporarily stuns all targets within the effective radius.

2823164517.name: G-16 Impact
2823164517.description: A high explosive grenade which detonates on first impact.

2877510587.name: G-3 Smoke
2877510587.description: A 'compliance weapon' to modify enemy behaviour. Creates a thick smoke screen to block targets' line of sight

3295898003.name: G-6 Frag
3295898003.description: An antipersonnel fragmentation grenade. Creates damage over a large area when detonated.

3748749890.name: G-10 Incendiary
3748749890.description: An incendiary grenade designed for igniting intense fires upon detonation. Spreads burning material over a moderate area, causing burn damage.

3869545997.name: G-123 Thermite Grenade
3869545997.description: A thermite grenade designed to adhere to surfaces before burning at 2000Â°C. Capable of burning through some armor

16338515.name: G-13 Incendiary Impact
16338515.description: Detonates on impact, covering the immediate vicinity in self-igniting white phosphorus.

1858752103.name: K-2 Throwing Knife
1858752103.description: Delivers silent justice to Freedom's enemies.

1255689962.name: G-4 Gas
1255689962.description: A grenade that releases a cloud of toxic gas, effective at blinding and slowing both organic and inorganic enemies.

1014.name: G-50 Seeker
1014.description: A grenade that releases a cloud of toxic gas, effective at blinding and slowing both organic and inorganic enemies.

1111.name: TED-63 Dynamite
1111.description: Creates a far-reaching incendiary blast ideal for crowd control against smaller enemies of Freedom. Equipped with a programmable timer for strategic versatility.

1215.name: G-142 Pyrotech
1215.description: A repurposed firework that showers its immediate surrounding area in sparks before exploding. As delightful as it is incendiary.

1318.name: G-109 Urchin
1318.description: This humane device attaches to its target and dispenses repeated electrical pulses, keeping the target in place for humane apprehension and/or termination.

1415.name: G-31 Arc
1415.description: A throwable device engineered to bounce when hitting the ground, releasing bursts of electricity on each impact. Warning: may bounce unpredictably.

1617.name: G-7 Pineapple
1617.description: A cluster fragmentation grenade. The shrapnel submunition allows it to inflict damage over a large area.
